name: BeyondTheMusic
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Beyond The Music’s flash briefing is a series of news, quotes, tips, and profiles on all of the behind-the-scenes stuff in the music industry. From photographer tips and tour stories, to career opportunities and legislation, this skill aims to further educate all fans of music. Some briefings will even feature individuals that work in the music industry. Stay tuned and start listening today!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
